details.title: Nonlinear asynchronous block iterative method
details.abstract: This paper proposes a class of asynchronous block iterative methods for solving large scale nonlinear equations F(x) = 0 and proves local convergence. This method splits F into p blocks, then does the asynchronous parallel iteration the p multiprocessor with shared memory. Because each processor need only solve equations with a low dimension and there is no synchronous waiting time, the parallel efficiercy can be increased. Finally, we give the results of the numerical test of three kinds of Newton-like asyrchronous block iteration methods which runwell on a multiprocessor system. These results show that the parallel efficiency is very high.
